title_full: IOTCOST01-BP01 Use a data lake for raw telemetry data
title: Use a data lake for raw telemetry data
description: Choose cost-efficient tools for data aggregation of IoT workloads by using a data lake for raw telemetry data. Store raw IoT data in Amazon S3 with appropriate storage classes to balance access requirements with cost.

title_full: IOTCOST01-BP02 Provide a self-service interface for end users to search, extract, manage, and update IoT data
title: Provide a self-service interface for end users to search, extract, manage, and update IoT data
description: Provide self-service interfaces for end users to search, extract, manage, and update IoT data. Reduce operational overhead and enable users to access data directly without requiring custom development for each data request.

title_full: IOTCOST01-BP03 Track and manage the utilization of data sources
title: Track and manage the utilization of data sources
description: Track and manage the utilization of data sources to identify unused or underutilized resources. Implement cost allocation tags and monitoring to understand data usage patterns and optimize accordingly.

title_full: IOTCOST01-BP04 Aggregate data at the edge where possible
title: Aggregate data at the edge where possible
description: Aggregate data at the edge where possible to reduce data transfer costs and cloud processing requirements. Use AWS IoT Greengrass to perform local aggregation, filtering, and preprocessing before sending data to the cloud.

title_full: IOTCOST02-BP01 Use lifecycle policies to archive your data
title: Use lifecycle policies to archive your data
description: Optimize cost of raw telemetry data by using lifecycle policies to archive data automatically. Configure S3 lifecycle policies to transition data to lower-cost storage classes as it ages.

title_full: IOTCOST02-BP02 Evaluate storage characteristics for your use case and align with the right services
title: Evaluate storage characteristics for your use case and align with the right services
description: Evaluate storage characteristics for your IoT use case and align with the right services. Consider access patterns, retention requirements, and query needs when selecting storage solutions.

title_full: IOTCOST02-BP03 Store raw archival data on cost effective services
title: Store raw archival data on cost effective services
description: Store raw archival IoT data on cost-effective services like Amazon S3 Glacier or S3 Glacier Deep Archive. Balance retrieval time requirements against storage costs for long-term data retention.

title_full: IOTCOST03-BP01 Select services to optimize cost
title: Select services to optimize cost
description: Optimize cost of interactions between devices and your IoT cloud solution by selecting services that match your workload characteristics. Compare AWS IoT Core, Basic Ingest, and other messaging options.

title_full: IOTCOST03-BP02 Implement and configure telemetry to reduce data transfer costs
title: Implement and configure telemetry to reduce data transfer costs
description: Implement and configure telemetry to reduce data transfer costs by optimizing message frequency, payload size, and compression. Send only essential data and aggregate where possible.

title_full: IOTCOST03-BP03 Use shadow only for slow changing data
title: Use shadow only for slow changing data
description: Use device shadows only for slow-changing data to optimize costs. Avoid frequent shadow updates for rapidly changing values; instead use direct messaging for high-frequency data.

title_full: IOTCOST03-BP04 Group and tag IoT devices and messages for cost allocation
title: Group and tag IoT devices and messages for cost allocation
description: Group and tag IoT devices and messages for cost allocation to understand costs by application, environment, or business unit. Use AWS cost allocation tags to track and attribute IoT costs accurately.

title_full: IOTCOST03-BP05 Implement and configure device messaging to reduce data transfer costs
title: Implement and configure device messaging to reduce data transfer costs
description: Implement and configure device messaging efficiently to reduce data transfer costs. Use appropriate Quality of Service (QoS) levels and message batching to optimize messaging costs.

title_full: IOTCOST04-BP01 Plan expected usage over time
title: Plan expected usage over time
description: Optimize cost by matching the supply of resources with device demand by planning expected usage over time. Forecast device fleet growth and data volumes to right-size infrastructure and leverage reserved capacity.

title_full: IOTCOST05-BP01 Balance networking throughput against payload size to optimize efficiency
title: Balance networking throughput against payload size to optimize efficiency
description: Optimize payload size between devices and your IoT system to save cost by balancing networking throughput against payload size. Use efficient serialization formats and compression appropriate for your device capabilities.

title: Optimize shadow operations
description: Optimize the costs of storing the current state of IoT devices by optimizing shadow operations. Minimize shadow document size, reduce update frequency, and use named shadows to separate concerns.
